title: Isn't it about time
body: For an item that does both magic and armour pen ?

replies.body: ezreal and corki would be like the only people this is reasonable on, as most people with double scaling cough cough akali, it still only does magic dmg, and even with ez the armour pen would only happen on his autos as on the spells its still only magic dmg, what about yi E active changing his auto dmg to magic instead of true

There's a good chance they've already thought about making a hybrid pen item. Considering one doesn't exist, I assume it's  problematic. I mean, what stats, passives and actives would it need to have to be an attractive yet cost-effective item? For example, the other pen items cost ~2700. It would easily be too much or too little, or the cost would be really high. 

No doubt it would be cool but I have no idea how you would even design such a thing.
red smite does true damage so i guess thats kinda the same thing :/
